name: Footwraps of the Oracle
tooltip:
Footwraps of the OracleLevel 60

Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Command, 2 Idols of Death, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Gold Scarabs to Kandrostrasz in Ahn'Qiraj.  This quest also requires Neutral faction with the Brood of Nozdormu.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Bindings of Command
- Idol of Death x 2
- Bronze Scarab x 5
- Gold Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
